about_subtitle: We mainly serve Perak, Genting, Kedah, Johor, Kuala Lumpur，我们也承接海外项目。
philosophy_text: Architecture is not only structure and space, but a dialogue between 人 and environment. We design spaces that are simple, elegant and 永恒感.
mission_text: We aim to create functional and beautiful designs. Every detail, from materials to form, is crucial，ensuring each project tells its unique story.
team_text: Our team consists of passionate architects and designers from different fields, collaborating together，为每个项目提供专业、creative and sustainable solutions.
